item.description:
Meet at 10:00 for a 10:30 launch.
Trip organizer: Jim Cole Jimcole@hotmail.com 401-377-1033.

Suitable for all boats and skill levels. This is a nice easy trip.

Changes and cancellations to trips will be sent out by 8AM Saturday. Please check your email before leaving for any trip.

Directions to put-in
(Please note: Laural Ave Bridge is closed (removed) so you can not get there from Rt-117)
Take I-95 N toward Providence
Take exit 6 for RI-3 N toward Coventry 0.2 mi
Turn left at RI-3 N/Nooseneck Hill Rd Continue to follow RI-3 N 4.5 mi
Turn left at Pilgrim Ave. Go to end at Laurel Ave. 0.7 mi
Put-in parking is on left just before Lauren Ave.
item.name: South Branch of the Pawtuxet
